name: Kate Hudson
description:
We've been wanting to profile Kate Hudson for a while. She's an interesting case: quarter Jewish by birth (mom Goldie Hawn is half), raised Jewish, but somehow also Buddhist... A lot of food for thought.

But we decided to wait for Kate to headline a quality movie to coincide with the profile. After all, this was a girl who was nominated for an Oscar before she was old enough to drink. Hollywood royalty. An A-Lister.

So we waited. And waited. Through flop after flop. Dreck like "You, Me and Dupree". "Fool's Gold". "My Best Friend's Girl". A-Lister? Right now, the C-List seems more appropriate.

So why are we profiling Kate now? Well, we're afraid that soon she'll slip off the C-List and into obscurity...
